5.9. comment Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block comment[; parameters]
  ...
  !endblock

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The comment filter is used to temporarily ignore a block of text.

Examples

!block comment
Ignore me
!endblock
